EmailTemplate.name: TSE: AWS re:Invent-Las Vegas 11_26_18.003 Pre-Event: Email Invite 2 - 2e Combine
EmailTemplate.subject: Hi {{lead.First Name:default=there}}, see you at AWS re:Invent?
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
Hi {{lead.First Name:default=there}},
Are you attending AWS re:Invent? Click here <[[https://turbonomic.jifflenow.com/reinvent2018/external_request/0ce7a1]]> for an opportunity to meet with our executives to discuss elevating your AWS projects.
- AWS Expertise: Turbonomic is one of only two AWS partners to achieve AWS Competencies in both Migration and Cloud Management.
- Analysts believe in us: Turbonomic is named a leader in the Forrester Wave: Cloud Cost Monitoring and Optimization.
- Our executives know their way around the cloud: Members of our executive team attending include:
- Bill Veghte - Turbonomic Executive Chairman, former EVP HPE, SVP Microsoft Windows - Ben Nye - Turbonomic CEO, former SVP VERITAS Software - Mor Cohen - Turbonomic Cloud CTO - Jennifer Heard - Turbonomic SVP, former VP Microsoft Worldwide Sales and Marketing Strategy
Meet with us for just 30 minutes, and walk away prepared to optimize your AWS environment.
Please request a meeting here <[[https://turbonomic.jifflenow.com/reinvent2018/external_request/0ce7a1]]>.
Best, Catherine
